attributes.additional_details: Over the years freddos have greatly enlarged in price. Back in the day these wonderfully delicious chocolate bars were 5p. These days they can range from anyways from 25p to 35! I feel that this is ruining just how delicious and popular the chocolate is because no matter how delicious they are they are not worth these prices even the ones that are filled with caramel are not worth 25-35p. I hope that we can go back to the good old days of we’re freddos we’re 5p, affordable and made people day.
attributes.background: I would like for the prices of freddos to return to 5p
